name: HackerEarth Inc.
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence-powered assessment platform intended to help large enterprises evaluate developers based on specific skills. The company's platform helps recruiters to identify and hire appropriate candidates from its community of developers and offers a skill assessment tool to computer programmers and endorses their capabilities through certifications, enabling recruiters to find the right candidate for technical jobs and also assess them.
one_liner: Developer of an artificial intelligence-powered assessment platform intended to help large enterprises evaluate developers based on specific skills. The company's platform helps recruiters to identify and hire appropriate candidates from its community of developers and offers a skill assessment tool to computer programmers and endorses their capabilities through certifications, enabling recruiters to find the right candidate for technical jobs and also assess them.
